medical_history.chief_complaint: Right suprapubic abdominal pain with fever/chills for 45 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 45 days ago and have progressively worsened over time. Pain improved temporarily with amoxicillin, Tylenol, and ibuprofen. The patient presented to two outside emergency departments but was discharged without diagnosis. Denies nausea, vomiting, change in bowel pattern, and change in appetite.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past Medical History: None. Past Surgical History: Right inguinal herniorrhaphy, left inguinal herniorrhaphy.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of gastrointestinal disorders and cancers. Denies family history of other cancers.
